contentList.content: These humanoids were transformed by the Shadowfell, until nothing remained but a mournful, joyless existence between life and death.
Netherese Shadar-kai emerged when the Spellplague awakened the latent shadow energy inherent in the bodies of those that had been born human in the Shadowfell.
Elven Shadar-kai were bound to the Shadowfell after the Raven Queen whom they served fell.
You have resistance to Necrotic damage, taking only half damage from it.
Raised in the Shadowfell, shadow-based curses don't affect you and you have a natural resistance to Necrotic damage.
This humanoid is really a Shadar-Kai
Elven Shadar-kai were bound to the Shadowfell after the Raven Queen whom they served fell.
These humanoids were transformed by the Shadowfell, until nothing remained but a mournful, joyless existence between life and death.
Born human, the Netherese were transformed by the Shadowfell, until nothing remained but a mournful, joyless existence between life and death.
Due to your connection to the Raven Queen, you gain a +[1] racial bonus to death saving throws.
Has <LSTag Tooltip="Proficiency">Proficiency</LSTag> in the chosen weapon or tool.
Gain <LSTag Tooltip="Proficiency">Proficiency</LSTag> in a chosen Weapon type.
Gain <LSTag Tooltip="Proficiency">Proficiency</LSTag> in a Light Hammers.
Gain <LSTag Tooltip="Proficiency">Proficiency</LSTag> in all <LSTag Tooltip="Skill">Skills</LSTag> of a chosen <LSTag Tooltip="Abilities">Ability</LSTag>.
Gain <LSTag Tooltip="Proficiency">Proficiency</LSTag> in Deception, Intimidation, Performance, and Persuasion.
Gain <LSTag Tooltip="Proficiency">Proficiency</LSTag> in Arcana, History, Investigation, Nature, and Religion.
Gain <LSTag Tooltip="Proficiency">Proficiency</LSTag> in Animal Handling, Insight, Medicine, Perception, and Survival.
Gain <LSTag Tooltip="Proficiency">Proficiency</LSTag> in Acrobatics, Sleight of Hand, and Stealth.
Has <LSTag Tooltip="Proficiency">Proficiency</LSTag> in a type of weapon.
You may enter a deep trance twice per day to gain <LSTag Tooltip="Proficiency">Proficiency</LSTag> in a <LSTag Tooltip="Weapon">Weapon</LSTag> or <LSTag Tooltip="Tool:">Tool</LSTag> of your choice.
You can enter a trance state twice a per long rest to alter your weapon <LSTag Tooltip="Proficiency">proficiency</LSTag>.
You can trance [1] times per rest to gain proficiency in a weapon type of your choice.
Astral Points can be used to alter your weapon <LSTag Tooltip="Proficiency">proficiency</LSTag>.
Gain <LSTag Tooltip="Proficiency">Proficiency</LSTag> in all <LSTag Tooltip="Skill">Skills</LSTag> of a chosen <LSTag Tooltip="Abilities">Ability</LSTag>.
Gain <LSTag Tooltip="Proficiency">Proficiency</LSTag> in Acrobatics, Sleight of Hand, and Stealth.
Gain <LSTag Tooltip="Proficiency">Proficiency</LSTag> in Arcana, History, Investigation, Nature, and Religion.
Gain <LSTag Tooltip="Proficiency">Proficiency</LSTag> in Animal Handling, Insight, Medicine, Perception, and Survival.
Gain <LSTag Tooltip="Proficiency">Proficiency</LSTag> in Deception, Intimidation, Performance, and Persuasion.
Twice per day you can enter a trance to gain <LSTag Tooltip="Proficiency">proficiency</LSTag> with a weapon or tool of your choice.
You have resistance to Necrotic damage.
You gain an additional Raven Point to power your Blessing of the Raven Queen spell.
Teleport to somewhere you can see.
You have a number of blessings equal to your proficiency level that you can use to teleport. Upon reaching level 3 your teleport also grants you resistance to all damage for one turn.
You have a number of raven points equal to your proficiency level that you can use to teleport. Upon reaching level 3 your teleport also grants you resistance to all damage for one turn.
You can teleport to a location you can see up to your proficiency level times per day.
Twice per day you can enter a trance to gain proficiency with a weapon or tool of your choice.
You can teleport to a location you can see up to your proficiency level times per day. You also gain resistance to all damage for one turn.
You can teleport to a location you can see up to your proficiency level times per day.
Improved Blessing of the Raven Queen
You can teleport to a location you can see up to your proficiency level times per day. Whenever you do, you recieve resistance to all damage for one turn.
Improved Blessing of the Raven Queen
You can teleport to a location you can see up to your proficiency level times per day. Whenever you do, you recieve resistance to all damage for one turn.
This dye is so dark no light passes through it, just like the Shadowfell itself.
The dye shimmers and swirls in deep bluish purple hues, much like a Raven's plumage.
This dye smells vaguely of mint and lime.
These hues give the appearance of one of Luskan's dignitaries.
This provacative Shadar-Kai outfit just doesn't seem to fit short, dragonborn, or half-orcs correctly.
